text.section: Support orders issued out of state shall be enforced in the same manner under this Part III of this subtitle as support orders issued in this State.

A recipient of an out-of-state support order may file a request for service of an earnings withholding order under § 10-126 of this subtitle by submitting the information required under § 10-126 of this subtitle, and a certified support order or a support order registered in this State.

section.section: A recipient of an out-of-state support order may request that the support enforcement agency file with the court a request for service of an earnings withholding order under § 10-126 of this subtitle by submitting a request for service, a certified support order, and a statement of arrears under oath.
A request under this subsection may be submitted by the recipient or a support enforcement agency.
